Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_CLEAR_CONFIG   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x02U)

Command to clear the VPS display path configuration in one shot.

This IOCTL takes either name of the pre-defined configuration or list of edges connecting nodes and clears the configuration. It also stops vencs.

It does not validates the edge list. It simply disables the edge connecting nodes. For the vencs, it checks for the validity and then disables the venc if there are not errors.

Use macro defined in this file for input path, muxes output and blender(overlay) as the node numbers.

This IOCTL cannot be used for clearing configuration on a path
streaming path.
Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DctrlConfig
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_DSS_SET_ADV_VENC_DISP_PARAMS
Value:
(VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE \
+ 0x2U)
VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE
#define VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE
Advanced configurations.
Definition: vps_displayCtrl.h:384

Command to program advance Venc Display parameters.

This IOCTL is used to program the advance Display parameters for the VENCS like stall mode, number of tft datalines, scanformat, which fid to display first etc. This is valid only for first three VENCS(DPI1/DPI2/DPI3), not valid for VPS_DCTRL_DSS_VENC_HDMI.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig.
Returns
VPS_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_DSS_SET_ADV_VENC_SIGNAL_PARAMS
Value:
( \
VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE + \
0x1U)
VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE
#define VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE
Advanced configurations.
Definition: vps_displayCtrl.h:384

Command to program advance Venc Signal parameters.

This IOCTL is used to program the advance signal parameters for the VENCS, parameters include when the Hsync and Vsync should be driver(rising or falling edge of the pixel clock), Hsync,Vsync,pixelclock,pixel data signals are gated, aC bias pin transition , ac bias pin frequency etc. This is valid only for first three VENCS(DPI1/DPI2/DPI3), not valid for VPS_DCTRL_DSS_VENC_HDMI.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvSignalConfig.
Returns
VPS_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_DSS_SET_ADV_VENC_TDM_PARAMS
Value:
(VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE \
+ 0x3U)
VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE
#define VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE
Advanced configurations.
Definition: vps_displayCtrl.h:384

Command to program advance Venc TDM(Time division multiplexing) parameters.

This IOCTL is used to program all the parameters related to TDM display. This is valid only for first three VENCS(DPI1/DPI2/DPI3), not valid for VPS_DCTRL_DSS_VENC_HDMI.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DssDispcAdvLcdTdmConfig.
Returns
VPS_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_ENABLE_SDVENC   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x08U)

Command to enable/disable the SDVENC.

This IOCTL is used to Enable/disable and Init/deinit the SD VENC. This IOCTL should be called before calling any SD VENC related IOCTL. In this IOCTL we put the Display Controller in Slave Mode and Disable the DPI output when SD Is Enabled. When its disabled we put DIPSC back to master mode and enable the DPI output. This IOCTL should be called after IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG IOCTL

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] (UInt32*) value enable/disable the SD-VENC 1- enable 0 - disable
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_GET_CPR_COEFF   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x10U)

IOCTl to get coefficients for color phase rotation of overlay.

This IOCTL can be used to get the CPR coefficients.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DssVencCprCoeff.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_GET_ERROR_STATS   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0AU)

IOCTl to get the count of number of sync losts of all the overlays and ocp error.

This IOCTL is used to get the count of number of sync losts occured for all the applicable overlays and number of ocp errors occured.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DctrlErrorSyncLostStats.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_GET_MFLAG_PARAM   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x13U)

IOCTl to get the mflag paramters.

This IOCTL can be used to get the mflag parameters currently configured.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_GET_VENC_BLANK_TIMING   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0DU)

IOCTl to get the venc blanking timing.

This IOCTL is used to get the current venc blanking timing information in the object of type Vps_DctrlVencBlankTiming passed in cmdArgs. This ioctl can be called dynamically at runtime after IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DctrlVencBlankTiming. Vps_DctrlVencBlankTiming->vencId should be set appropriately. Use one of the following values for the venc id - VPS_DCTRL_DSS_VENC_LCD1, VPS_DCTRL_DSS_VENC_LCD2, VPS_DCTRL_DSS_VENC_LCD3.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_GET_VENC_OUTPUT   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x04U)

Command to get output in the given Venc.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DctrlOutputInfo
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_HDMI_FLIP_DATA_P_N_ORDER   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x11U)

IOCTl to flip the data (D0, D1, D2) P and N pad control of HDMI output.

This IOCTL is typically not used and is requried only when there is an issue in the board layout in swapping the pads. This is applicable only for TDA2xx, TDA2Px and TDA2Ex.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] NULL, not used
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SDVENC_GET_DEF_ADV_CONFIG
Value:
(VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + \
0x0BU)
VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE
#define VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE
IOCTL base address for the display controller driver IOCTLs.
Definition: vps.h:111

IOCTl to get the sdvenc default configuration.

This IOCTL is used initialize the object of Vps_DssDispcSdVencAdvConfig passed in cmdArgs with the default values.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DssDispcSdVencAdvConfig. Vps_DssDispcSdVencAdvConfig->videoStandard should be set to get proper default values
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SDVENC_SET_ADV_CONFIG   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0CU)

IOCTl to set the sdvenc configuration.

This IOCTL is used to set the sd venc configuration using the object of Vps_DssDispcSdVencAdvConfig passed in cmdArgs.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DssDispcSdVencAdvConfig.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x01U)

Command to set the entire VPS display path configuration in one shot.

All the VPS modules handled by the Display Controller can be represented by a graph, where node represents a module like blender, mux etc. and edge is present between two nodes if they are connected. All VPS paths can be configured by this IOCTL in one shot. Use macro defined in this file for input path, muxes output and blender(overlay) as the node numbers.

This IOCTL takes either name of the pre-defined configuration or list of edges connecting nodes and configures display paths. It first validates these paths and then configures VPS for the display paths. It configures all the modules present in the path.

This IOCTL cannot be used for clearing configuration on a path
streaming path.
Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DctrlConfig
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_CPR_COEFF   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0FU)

IOCTl to set coefficients for color phase rotation of overlay.

This IOCTL can be used to set the CPR coefficients. Note: Default BT601 coefficients are set. IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_VENC_OUTPUT ioctl will disable CPR and enable/disable CSC based dvo Format, this is not changed for backward compatibility. This ioctl should be called after IOCTL_VPSCORE_DCTRL_SET_VENC_OUTPUT to enable/disable CPR and CSC. also note that both the CRP and CSC should not be enabled simultaneously.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DssVencCprCoeff.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_MFLAG_PARAM   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x12U)

IOCTl to set the mflag paramters.

This IOCTL can be used to set the mflag parameters currently configured.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DssDispcMflagConfigParam.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_OVLY_PARAMS   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x05U)

Command to set output in the given Venc.

This IOCTL is used to set the Overlay parameters like transparency color key, background color, alphablender, overlay optimization etc.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DssDispcOvlyPanelConfig
Returns
VPS_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_PIPELINE_PARAMS   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x06U)

Command to set Pipeline related params.

This IOCTL is used to set the pipeline parameters related to display contoller like Zorder, global alpha and premultiply alpha.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DssDispcOvlyPipeConfig
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_SDVENC_MODE   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x09U)

Command to configure the SDVENC for particular video mode(NTSC/PAL).

This IOCTL is used to configure the SD-VENC for different video modes like NTSC, PAL variants.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DctrlSDVencVideoStandard. Standard to which the SDVENC should be configured for For valid values see Fvid2_Standard. Supported only NTSC and PAL Format as of now.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_VENC_BLANK_TIMING   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0EU)

IOCTl to set the venc blanking timing.

This IOCTL is used to set the venc mode information using the object of Vps_DctrlVencBlankTiming passed in cmdArgs. This ioctl can be called dynamically at runtime after IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_CONFIG. Note: The change in timing will take effect from the next vsync. This API should be called in the vsync callback to the application in the ISR context or immediately after that in task/swi context. Calling this ioctl near the vsync should be avoided as the shadow to work copy could happens while we are changing the timing parameters and could result in taking only a part of this configuration for next one frame or delaying the timing change by next one frame. Subsequent frames will have proper timing.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] pointer of type Vps_DctrlVencBlankTiming.
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_VENC_OUTPUT   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x03U)

Command to set output in the given Venc.

This IOCTL is used to set the output i.e. dataformat, polarities of all the signals of the given venc if venc is not on. For the tied vencs, venc has to be stopped first, then output can can be changed.This IOCTL should be called before SET_CONFIG_IOCTL.

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DctrlOutputInfo
Returns
VPS_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define IOCTL_VPS_DCTRL_SET_VENC_PCLK_DIVISORS   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x07U)

Command to set Venc(Overlay) pixel clock divisor params.

This IOCTL is used to set the divisor values for the Venc pixel clock. DISPC_LCDx_PCLK = (LCDx_CLK/ divisorLCD) / divisorPCD

Parameters
cmdArgs[IN] Pointer of type Vps_DctrlVencDivisorInfo
Returns
FVID2_SOK if successful, else suitable error code
#define VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_ADV_BASE   (VPS_DCTRL_IOCTL_BASE + 0x100U)

Advanced configurations.

Marker used to denote the begining of IOCTLs that would be required for advanced control

CAUTION Ensure that basic IOCTL value does not execeed this value
